titleStmt.title: An essay upon satyr, or, A poem on the times under the names of the golden age, the silver age, the brazen age, and the iron age : to which is added, A satyr against Separatists.
titleStmt.author: Buckingham, John Sheffield, Duke of, 1648-1720 or 21.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Sheffield and John Dryden. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
